editConfirmationDialog.title: Edit this TOTP
editConfirmationDialog.message: It seems that this TOTP has been encrypted using a different key that your current one. This can happen if you have changed your master password on another device. If you edit this TOTP, it will be encrypted using your current key. Do you want to continue ?

deleteConfirmationDialog.title: Delete this TOTP
deleteConfirmationDialog.message: Do you really want to delete this TOTP ?

decryptDialog.title: Decrypt TOTP
decryptDialog.message: This TOTP has been encrypted using a different a master password. Please enter it below in order to decrypt it.

message.one: Do you want to change your master password or to encrypt this TOTP with your current encryption key ?
message.other: This TOTP has been decrypted with success, and the password has successfully decrypted more TOTPs. What do you want to do ?

changeAllDecryptedTotpsKey.title: Encrypt TOTPs with your current key
changeAllDecryptedTotpsKey.subtitle: Change this TOTP encryption key as well as those that have been decrypted, and use yours instead.

title.one: Encrypt this TOTP with your current key
title.other: Encrypt only this TOTP with your current key

changeTotpKey.subtitle: Change this TOTP encryption key, and use yours instead. The other decrypted TOTPs will be usable as long as you leave the app opened.

changeMasterPassword.title: Change your current master password
changeMasterPassword.subtitle:
Use the entered password as your new master password and generate an encryption key from it.
All TOTPs still encrypted with another password will need to be decrypted manually.

doNothing.title: Do nothing
doNothing.subtitle: You will have to reenter this password to decrypt this TOTP.

page.uriError: Unable to read this TOTP. Are you sure it is valid ?
